column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My father and I got there on a Tuesday night and were told to expect a 15-20 minute wait. Not bad
column2: we figured it represented how good the restaurant was. They asked us to give a phone number and said they would text us when they were ready to seat us
column3: and to place our pizza orders at the counter to expedite our food getting to us when we were seated.
